text: Mohamed Safwat (; born 19 September 1990) is an Egyptian tennis player. He is the Egyptian Number 1, and the second-highest ranked Arab player behind Malek Jaziri. == Singles titles == Legend (Singles) ATP Challenger Tour (0) Futures (22) No. Date Tournament Surface
